# GitHub Repository Configuration

Use these values when configuring the repository on GitHub (Settings → General, or the About section).

## Repository Description (GitHub Description)

**Short (recommended for GitHub — fits in About box):**

```
Execution OS for AI reasoning workflows.
```

**Long (for README, docs, or when more context is needed):**

```
A durable execution runtime for reasoning systems — orchestrating long-running AI processes with persistence, replay, and human-in-the-loop control.
```

## GitHub Topics

Add these topics in GitHub → About → Topics (click the gear icon):

```
ai-runtime
agent-runtime
workflow-engine
durable-execution
reasoning-engine
llm-infrastructure
ai-orchestration
distributed-systems
execution-engine
rust
autonomous-agents
human-in-the-loop
state-machine
backend-infrastructure
ai-os
```

**Must-have for discoverability:**

* `workflow-engine`
* `agent-runtime`
* `durable-execution`
* `ai-runtime`
* `rust`

## Elevator Pitch (HackerNews / Twitter / One-liner)

> Oris is Temporal for reasoning systems — a durable execution runtime for long-running AI processes.
